description: This file defines and configures an agent for querying stock prices using yfinance tools within a language database context.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools and models.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: A class representing the response returned after running an agent.

classes.name: LangDB
classes.description: A class representing a language database model used within the agent.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: A class providing tools to fetch financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to print the agent's response to the terminal.
